li.label: Vessel
li.description: The vessel of Sukuna is a chosen host imbued with the malevolent presence of Sukuna, a powerful cursed spirit, shaping the narrative of 'Jujutsu Kaisen' with their intertwined destinies.

li.label: Six Eyes
li.description: Six Eyes are not a cursed technique that needs to be activated, but an innate gift that grants the bearer the ability to master the Limitless.
